thread.title: Theatre break with friend
thread.title_full: Theatre break with friend - Review of Hilton London Angel Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: carolannr685
title: Theatre break with friend
text: Went to London for a girlie weekend, planned a theatre show on the Friday evening and on the Saturday booked a tour round Wimbledon. Train journey was very good there and back then stopped of at Leceister Square for a Cocktail before returning back to Angel Islington.
